title: 怎么让玩家无法去基岩世界，用灵宝稿子也不能去
txt_content: 怎么让玩家无法去基岩世界，用灵宝稿子也不能去

replies.author: ucai
replies.txt_content:
config-ThaumicTinkerer.cfg里
把# Set to the dimension id wished for bedrock dimension, or 0 to disable
        I:"Bedrock dimension id"=-19
设置为0即可

replies.author: dbaizhishang
replies.txt_content: 把基岩禁掉，设置为禁止挖掘
